definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: HK$5,000 for the stamp duty deposit.
sentences.chinese: 港币五千元之印花税按金。

sentences.english: Ad valorem stamp duty is payable by the transferee(s) if this form is completed.
sentences.chinese: 如已填妥本表格，承让人须缴付从价印花税。

sentences.english: The stamp duty and the legal costs will be shared equally between both of you.
sentences.chinese: 至于印花税和律师费将由买卖双方平分。

sentences.english: Stamp duty shall be exempted if the taxable amount does not exceed one jiao (1/10 of a yuan or 10 fen).
sentences.chinese: 应纳税额不足一角的，免纳印花税。

sentences.english: Hong Kong stamp duty is payable by the transferee(s) if this form is completed.
sentences.chinese: 填妥此表格后，承让人须缴付香港印花税。

sentences.english: In 1766, Parliament repealed the Stamp Act.
sentences.chinese: 1766年，英国议会撤消了印花税法案。

sentences.english: The current regulations on stamp tax shall be acted upon in rd to other tax-exemption matters.
sentences.chinese: 其他征免事宜，均按照印花税现行规定执行。

sentences.english: The unjust Stamp Act must be annulled.
sentences.chinese: 必须废止这个不公正的印花税案。

sentences.english: More recently, state governments have abolished stamp duty for first-time buyers.
sentences.chinese: 最近，各州政府取消了首次购房者的印花税。

sentences.english: A: The stamp duty and the legal costs will be shared equally between both of you.
sentences.chinese: 至于印花税和律师费将由买卖双方平分。

sentences.english: Hong Kong stamp duty is payable by the transferor(s) if this form is completed.
sentences.chinese: 填妥此表格后，转让人须缴付香港印花税。

definition: personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
